name: Mermaid Mission Titanic
description:
You're a new recruit in the mermaid army, working under Commander Flipsy, the dolphin. After a successful job in shark territory, you're given a top secret mission: become a human and learn the truth about the Titanic.

See, the humans are building a giant ship called the Titanic. It's the largest ship that has ever been built, which has the mermaids worried. Could it be the humans are planning to invade the mermaid kingdom? The ship launches later this week, so you don't have a lot of time to explore the human world and discover what's going on.
To make matters worse, there are three other mermaids who have been sent on this mission. All three of them disappeared, and no one has any idea what happened to them. Can you avoid their fate? Can you successfully pose as a human, without being discovered by your curious roommate Andreas or the foul villain Maynard? Will you help the mermaids destroy the [I]Titanic[/I], or will you choose to side with the humans?

With multiple endings, puzzles, colorful artwork and a script that's over 36,000 words, Mermaid Mission Titanica game that's sure to delight mermaid fans of all ages. This visual novel comes from the author of Cat President: A More Purrfect Union and The Pizza Delivery Boy Who Saved the World.
